# NEProxyServer

**Class**

`NEProxyServer` contains settings for a proxy server.

## Declaration

```swift
class NEProxyServer
```

## Overview

`NEProxyServer` instances are used inside of [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxySettings] instances to configure proxy settings for VPN connections.

## Initializing a Proxy Server

- **init(address:port:)**: Initialize a newly-allocated `NEProxyServer` object

## Accessing Proxy Server Properties

- **address**: The address of the proxy server.
- **port**: The TCP port on which the proxy server is listening for connections.
- **authenticationRequired**: A Boolean indicating if the server requires authentication credentials.
- **username**: The username portion of the authentication credential to be used to authenticate with the proxy server.
- **password**: The password portion of the authentication credential to be used to authenticate with the proxy server.

## Accessing Manual Proxy Properties

- **httpEnabled**: A Boolean indicating if a static HTTP proxy will be used.
- **httpServer**: An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxyServer] object containing the static HTTP proxy server settings.
- **httpsEnabled**: A Boolean indicating if a static HTTPS proxy will be used.
- **httpsServer**: An [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEProxyServer] object containing the static HTTPS proxy server settings.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
